nodes.text: A court conceivably could find that the use of cluster bombs in such circumstances is a war crime
If used where civilians are present the size of the area they attack and the difficulty of directing them reliably mean that civilian casualties - sometimes substantial casualties - are foreseeable
The use of weapons to kill citizens is considered a war crime
Not precision weapons range of action is not limitated to their target but cause damages to the surrounding area
Even in their new  wind-corrected  form cluster bombs are not precision weapons
A typical cluster bomb is a container that opens in mid-air and scatters up to 200 bomblets over an area the size of half a soccer field
Bombs that do not destroy only their target but involve in their effects the sourronding area are not-precision  weapons
